title: Omega Teemo's 'R' (shrooms) rediculous
body: Okay Riot, so you came out with this amazing skin for Teemo. I've seen all of the things it does and I think its wonderful, except that the fact.. That his R are still mushrooms. Teemo is no doubt known for his mushrooms, but we're talking about a legendary skin, change the model for the actual mushroom to something that matches the skin. Idk, a landmine, a nuke, something to match the skin other than those goofy mushrooms. If you are going to use shrooms, make them look more detailed. Hail Teemo.{{champion:17}}

replies.body: They will be changing, they're just not on PBE yet. :]

Still gonna be shrooms, though, yes? the pics over at surrender@20 seem to be his regular mushrooms, except they have a little flame symbol on them.

It's shame they can't be poison grenades/landmines or something.
You'll have to wait and see! :D
Is this a new thing now where there is a visual indicator when the Shrooms explode that you can see the area that they do damage over?
Actually if you look at the SS pre-release vid (in the S@20 post) and listen they have audio cues that sound very mechanical. I wouldn't be surprised if the models turns out to be landmines.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=EhmhqIk0,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-03-25T22:35:42.202+0000)
>
> They will be changing, they're just not on PBE yet. :]

What about the new rammus skin? Will it get Some more particles? Because Skarner got every single spell changed for the same price :/ I started a poll  and the community seems to think the same.
Here a Link, i would be honored if you would look at the Post.
 

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/NZIkeAsk-guardian-of-the-sands-rammus-particleeffects

The earliest they can be out is next patch which will be somewhere around two weeks from now, give or take a few days. Wait a little bit and see if stuff is added, because they *just* went to PBE and modern skins are usually missing a few pieces that took a bit longer. Particles are a usually suspect in that regard.

Even then I doubt they'll be out even that that soon. You have time, if they're still not up next week *then* vye for additions.

They're simply placeholders for new ones. source: https://twitter.com/RiotKateyKhaos/status/580832166411563008

When stuff is on the PBE, especially skin/visual stuff, don't be so hasty.
The model hasn't been added yet, the skin is still a WIP. Just give it some time.
So this kid has PBE access who doesn't even understand it, but I haven't been approved?  Sad day.
I meant to put in should change the model.
